channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【Quicksilver v2: evolution of a globally distributed key-value store (Part 2)】闪电侠v2：全球分布式键值存储的演变（第2部分）
item.description: 【 This is part two of a story about how we overcame the challenges of making a complex system more scalable. 】 This is part two of a story about how we overcame the challenges of making a complex system more scalable.

item.title: 【Cloudflare 1.1.1.1 incident on July 14, 2025】2025年7月14日Cloudflare 1.1.1.1事件
item.description: 【 July 14th, 2025, Cloudflare made a change to our service topologies that caused an outage for 1.1.1.1 on the edge, causing downtime for 62 minutes for customers using the 1.1.1.1 public DNS Resolver. 】 July 14th, 2025, Cloudflare made a change to our service topologies that caused an outage for 1.1.1.1 on the edge, causing downtime for 62 minutes for customers using the 1.1.1.1 public DNS Resolver.

item.title: 【How TimescaleDB helped us scale analytics and reporting】时间序列数据库如何帮助我们扩展分析和报告
item.description: 【 Cloudflare chose TimescaleDB to power its Digital Experience Monitoring and Zero Trust Analytics products. 】Cloudflare选择TimescaleDB来支持其数字体验监控和零信任分析产品。

item.title: 【Cloudflare recognized as a Visionary in 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for SASE Platforms】Cloudflare 被列为 2025 年 Gartner® 魔法象限™ SASE 平台的愿景者
item.description: 【 Gartner has recognized Cloudflare as a Visionary in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for SASE Platforms report. 】 Gartner has recognized Cloudflare as a Visionary in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for SASE Platforms report.

item.title: 【Explore your Cloudflare data with Python notebooks, powered by marimo】使用 Python 笔记本探索您的 Cloudflare 数据，由 marimo 提供支持
item.description: 【 We’ve partnered with marimo to bring their best-in-class Python notebook experience to your Cloudflare data. 】我们已与 marimo 合作，将他们一流的 Python 笔记本体验带到您的 Cloudflare 数据中。

item.title: 【Hyper-volumetric DDoS attacks skyrocket: Cloudflare’s 2025 Q2 DDoS threat report】超体积DDoS攻击激增：Cloudflare 2025年第二季度DDoS威胁报告
item.description: 【 June was the busiest month for DDoS attacks in 2025 Q2, accounting for nearly 38% of all observed activity. 】6月是2025年第二季度DDoS攻击最繁忙的月份，占所有观察到活动的近38%。

item.title: 【Content Independence Day: no AI crawl without compensation!】内容独立日：没有补偿就没有AI抓取！
item.description: 【 It’s Content Independence Day: Cloudflare, along with a majority of the world's leading publishers and AI companies, is changing the default to block AI crawlers unless they pay creators for content. 】这是内容独立日：Cloudflare 与世界上大多数领先的出版商和人工智能公司一起，正在将默认设置更改为阻止人工智能爬虫，除非它们为内容支付给创作者。

item.title: 【Quicksilver v2: evolution of a globally distributed key-value store (Part 1)】闪电侠v2：全球分布式键值存储的演进（第一部分）
item.description: 【 This blog post is the first of a series, in which we share our journey in redesigning Quicksilver — Cloudflare’s distributed key-value store that serves over 3 billion keys per second globally. 】这篇博文是系列文章的第一篇，我们将分享重新设计Quicksilver——Cloudflare的分布式键值存储系统——的历程，该系统在全球每秒处理超过30亿个键。

item.title: 【Introducing simple and secure egress policies by hostname in Cloudflare’s SASE platform】通过主机名在Cloudflare的SASE平台上引入简单且安全的出站策略
item.description: 【 Cloudflare's SASE platform now offers egress policies by hostname, domain, content category, and application in open beta. 】Cloudflare的SASE平台现在在公开测试版中提供按主机名、域名、内容类别和应用程序的出口策略。

item.title: 【The crawl before the fall… of referrals: understanding AI’s impact on content providers】跌倒前的爬行……推荐机制的影响：理解人工智能对内容提供者的影响
item.description: 【 Cloudflare Radar now shows how often a given AI model sends traffic to a site relative to how often it crawls that site. This helps site owners make decisions about which AI bots to allow or block. 】Cloudflare Radar现在显示给定AI模型向网站发送流量的频率，相对于其爬取该网站的频率。这有助于网站所有者决定允许或阻止哪些AI机器人。
